long_description: These chic Terry Metro women's bike shorts will take you on a tour around the city, with a full feature set to keep you on your wheels. Stretch-woven, quick-drying nylon fabric of outer shorts moves moisture away for cool, dry comfort. Removable liner shorts feature nylon/spandex blend for moisture-wicking, chafe-free comfort under any of your casual bottoms. Comfort chamois in liner shorts boosts comfort in the saddle for short to moderate rides; antimicrobial finish discourages odors. Snaps on adjustable waistband personalize the fit. 4 pockets keep all your essentials stowed; 2 front zippered pockets, 1 back patch pocket and 1 cargo pocket with hidden magnet closure. Terry Metro shorts feature reflective hits to boost your visibility in low light.
